channel.title: Pi How to add correct Item Slot
channel.description: I have already added my models and the ints into my client but the problems is that every time I spawn it and equip it; the item always goes in the weapon slot even if it is something like a cape. How do I make it so that when I get a item such as a cape it would go in the cape slot instead of the weapon slot.

item.title: Pi How to add correct Item Slot
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

I have already added my models and the ints into my client but the problems is that every time I spawn it and equip it; the item always goes in the weapon slot even if it is something like a cape.
